nodes.documentation:
Issue this log event to signal a desired change in validator set.
 This will not lead to a change in active validator set until
 finalizeChange is called.

	/// Only the last log event of any block can take effect.
 If a signal is issued while another is being finalized it may never
 take effect.

	/// _parentHash here should be the parent block hash, or the
 signal will not be recognized.
nodes.name: InitiateChange

nodes.documentation:
Called when an initiated change reaches finality and is activated.
 Only valid when msg.sender == SYSTEM (EIP96, 2**160 - 2).

	/// Also called when the contract is first enabled for consensus. In this case,
 the "change" finalized is the activation of the initial set.
nodes.name: finalizeChange

nodes.documentation:
Reports benign misbehavior of validator of the current validator set
 (e.g. validator offline).
nodes.name: reportBenign

nodes.documentation:
Reports malicious misbehavior of validator of the current validator set
 and provides proof of that misbehavor, which varies by engine
 (e.g. double vote).
nodes.name: reportMalicious

nodes.documentation: Get current validator set (last enacted or initial if no changes ever made).
nodes.name: getValidators

nodes.documentation:

 This will not lead to a change in active validator set until
 finalizeChange is called.

	/// Only the last log event of any block can take effect.

 signal will not be recognized.
nodes.name: InitiateChange

nodes.documentation:
Called when an initiated change reaches finality and is activated.
 Only valid when msg.sender == SYSTEM (EIP96, 2**160 - 2).

	/// Also called when the contract is first enabled for consensus. In this case,
 the "change" finalized is the activation of the initial set.
nodes.name: finalizeChange

 (e.g. validator offline).

finalizeChange().notice: Called when an initiated change reaches finality and is activated. Only valid when msg.sender == SYSTEM (EIP96, 2**160 - 2). 	/// Also called when the contract is first enabled for consensus. In this case, the "change" finalized is the activation of the initial set.

getValidators().notice: Get current validator set (last enacted or initial if no changes ever made).

reportBenign(address,uint256).notice: Reports benign misbehavior of validator of the current validator set (e.g. validator offline).

reportMalicious(address,uint256,bytes).notice: Reports malicious misbehavior of validator of the current validator set and provides proof of that misbehavor, which varies by engine (e.g. double vote).
